column4: Hi everybody -- I've got an audio issue that's driving me nuts.  I'm running Lucid on my media pc, which boots into Gnome to run XBMC typically, but is for the moment without a monitor.  I want to SSH in and play audio from the CLI, but every time I reboot, the audio is muted.  However, alsamixer says it's not.  If I attach a monitor and go into Gnome, I can unmute in the graphical volume control, but I can't find any way to unmute from th
yeah, alsamixer shows the master channel as open
